entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers beginning early this evening then changing to a few flurries or rain showers near midnight and ending overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:43 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
